price: Báyẹn ni (ọ̀rọ̀ ṣe rí)! Òjíṣẹ́ kan kò wá bá àwọn tó ṣíwájú wọn àfi kí wọ́n wí pé: “Òpìdán tàbí wèrè ni.”
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُواْ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika mā atā alladhīna min qablihim min rasūlin illā qālū sāḥirun aw majnūnun
